value:
$WmMPID_ハロナーガ,ch04_33_Naga_F_Halloween22,Face|Sweets and scares in equal measure.
This festival is a delight.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ミラ,ch10_18_Duma_MF_Pair,Face|There are more children this way,
Brother. Let us approach them next.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ドーマ|Very well. We shall ambush them
from behind, lest they flee before
we can deploy the candy.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Don't worry, Nils. We'll find you some
dragon friends yet.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|Let's leave the divine ones be and
find someone a bit more...grounded.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Look, I appreciate the effort, but
you really don't have to do this...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|I'm sorry, Nils. I really thought we'd
be able to get some dragons together
for you.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|Dragons can be a bit unapproachable
at times, I'm realizing.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|I really do appreciate the time and
effort you both put in. I'm fine,
though, I promise.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Are you sure?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Yeah. If nothing else, it was nice to
see the other dragons getting so
involved with the festival.$k$pI think, if they're able to enjoy their
time among the humans, then there's
no reason I can't too.$k$pIt might not be as easy for me to relax
around them, but this festival's as
good a time as any to give it a try.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|That's a great way to think of it.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Back home, there were a few humans
I was able to feel comfortable around.
I grew to trust them over time.$k$pI'd like to have that here in this
world too.$k$pFor that to happen, though, I need to
open myself up to the possibility first.
Thanks for helping me realize that.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|Happy to help. So, are you ready to
head down to the festival now?
No time like the present, right?$k$pWait... Where'd the other Corrin go?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Hi! Sorry for slipping off like that, but
I found the perfect person to keep
Nils company.$k$p$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Hello, Nils! Are you taking part in the
harvest festival too?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Ninian!$k$p$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|I was just thinking how lovely it would
be to have you with me this time, and
here you are. It is so good to see you.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Likewise. And from the sound of it,
you've taken part in festivals like this
one before?$k$p$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, yes. They only come around
every so often, but they are ever
so much fun.$k$pEach occasion brings with it exciting
people to meet, and delicious treats
to try!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Halloween22,Face|Your enthusiasm is rubbing off on me
already. Mind showing me around?$k$p$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch01_10_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Certainly. Oh, but before we go,
let me introduce you to my friend...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|$Fi1500|Looks like our work here is done.
There's no better company for this
sort of thing than family.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|Absolutely. He seems much happier
now than when we first ran into him.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Halloween22,Face|Kind of makes me want to gather my
own family up for a night at the
harvest festival.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロカムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_F_Halloween22,Face|I couldn't agree more. Why don't we
track down some of our brothers
and sisters?$k$p$Sbs150|
